Title: Machine Learning Scientist II - Experiences
Description:
We believe that we are better together, and at Tripadvisor we welcome you for who you are. Our workplace is for everyone, as is our people powered platform. At Tripadvisor, we want you to bring your unique identities, abilities, and experiences, so we can collectively revolutionize travel and together find the good out there.

We are looking for an experienced scientist to join our Machine Learning team, focusing primarily on the Tripadvisor Experiences business. Our Experiences vertical provides customers with a collection of over 300K bookable products - experiences like glacier hikes in Alaska, guided walking tours in Lisbon, swimming with pigs in the Bahamas, and many, many more. The fast-growing user and product spaces pose a significant challenge for us: how to match users with experiences that are relevant to them, and how to learn as much as we can about the products in our inventory. As a Machine Learning Scientist working in this space, you will have the opportunity to apply your modeling and engineering skills to a number of different areas, but with a particular focus on sort and recommendation and item representation. In this role, you will deploy your solutions online and be able to observe the impact of your work in real time as you help the company grow. In your day to day, you will collaborate with a broad multidisciplinary team, including other ML scientists, analysts, product managers, and engineers to build ML powered solutions and get them on the website to solve user problems. You’ll be encouraged to take ownership of your projects and to find new opportunities and problems where machine learning could be applied to improve the business.

About Machine Learning At Tripadvisor

Tripadvisor is the web's leading travel information site. At Tripadvisor, the ML Team creates systems that influence the travel decisions of millions of people per day. We apply cutting edge machine learning techniques to a wide variety of areas, including recommenders, online advertising, vision, text processing, and natural language processing. To ensure continued success, Tripadvisor promotes a culture of personal development, including social activities, journal clubs, memberships in online learning resources, and participation in industry conferences. Have a great time while shaping the future of travel!

Location: Please note, this position will be either office, hybrid or remote-based within Portugal.

What You Will Be Doing


Participate in the design and deployment of machine learning models to solve a variety of core business problems across the Experiences business.
Seek out new opportunities to apply data science and machine learning in the Experiences space.
Prototype, evaluate, deploy and maintain new models in production
Design A/B tests and analyze their results
Communicate progress and interpretation of model output/performance to technical and business stakeholders
Participate in the determination of next steps for each project


What You Are Like


Team player
Loves to learn
Great communicator
Gets things done on time and on specification


Qualifications


PhD in Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, or related quantitative field (or Masters with 2+ years of practical experience).
Excellent communication skills for both technical and non-technical audiences.
Strong foundation in machine learning and statistics.
Solid foundation on data structures and algorithms.
Proficiency in Python.
Experience with sort and recommendation modeling a plus.
Experience working with real-world data strongly preferred.
Previous industry experience a plus.


We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates. If you need a reasonable accommodation during the application or the recruiting process, please make sure to reach out to your individual recruiter or our team at recruitment@tripadvisor.com


Show more

Title: Junior NLP Engineer (Artificial Intelligence)
Description:
The field of artificial intelligence is rapidly advancing and transforming industries across the globe. At TransPerfect, we are embracing this technological wave by integrating AI innovations into our processes. As a part of our Artificial Intelligence team (AI team), the Junior NLP Engineer will learn and collaborate with specialists in technologies such as Natural Language Processing (NLP) and contribute to projects that align with our customer-focused objectives.

The Junior NLP Engineer will support the enhancement of cutting-edge NLP technologies with an emphasis on supporting translation, multilingual content generation, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) systems. This role involves understanding and assisting in the development, design, and implementation of NLP-related software products. The Junior Engineer will work closely with team members and Product Managers (PdM) to ensure project alignment with company goals, coordinate with the Quality Assurance team (QA team) during development phases, and assist the Support team with troubleshooting and bug resolution.

DESCRIPTION

Actively participate in projects involving NLP technologies and support their integration into business applications.
Assist in the analysis, design, development, maintenance, and support of AI-driven applications, web services, and APIs focused on NLP.
Collaborate on projects related to machine translation, summarization, and natural language generation to meet key business objectives.
Assist in gathering, curating, and organizing data crucial to building robust NLP technologies, using publicly available datasets when necessary.
Support the proposal and implementation of NLP solutions to address complex business requirements.
Contribute to the development of multilingual content generation and RAG systems under the guidance of senior engineers.
Write and implement clean code while helping maintain and optimize existing systems, focusing on bug fixes and minor patches.
Document code and processes clearly for the benefit of the AI team.
Continuously seek out process improvements and suggest enhancements.




REQUIRED SKILLS

Fundamental programming skills with exposure to both Front-end and Back-end development.
Basic knowledge of programming languages such as Python, with an interest in further developing these skills for NLP tasks.
Familiarity with AI and NLP frameworks or tools like TensorFlow or PyTorch is a bonus.
A strong willingness to learn about LLMs and experience in any related projects is advantageous.
Problem-solving skills and an interest in creative approaches to AI challenges.
Ability to learn and adapt quickly to new technologies in AI and NLP.
Analytical thinking and the ability to work independently as well as in dynamic teams.
Good communication skills to collaborate effectively within the team.
Attention to detail and a commitment to quality, with a basic understanding of writing unit tests.




REQUIRED EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS

Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, or a related field.
Interest or experience in software development, with a focus on AI/ML and NLP is preferred.
Exposure to full software development life cycle practices, including coding standards and code reviews.
Experience working with APIs and basic knowledge of databases.
A basic understanding of product development and a willingness to participate in product discussions.




DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

A strong interest in natural language processing and machine learning practices.
Experience with LLM applications for translation or content generation is a plus.
Interest in full-stack development is beneficial.
Experience or interest in working within collaborative team settings on AI projects.
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., GIT) is desirable.
Experience or interest in the localization or language services industry is advantageous.







By applying, I confirm I have read and accept TransPerfect's Privacy Policy: https://www.transperfect.com/about/data-privacy-recruiting.

Show more

  • Support the proposal and implementation of NLP solutions to address complex business requirements.
  • Contribute to the development of multilingual content generation and RAG systems under the guidance of senior engineers.
  • Write and implement clean code while helping maintain and optimize existing systems, focusing on bug fixes and minor patches.
  • Document code and processes clearly for the benefit of the AI team.
  • Continuously seek out process improvements and suggest enhancements.


REQUIRED SKILLS

  • Fundamental programming skills with exposure to both Front-end and Back-end development.
  • Basic knowledge of programming languages such as Python, with an interest in further developing these skills for NLP tasks.
  • Familiarity with AI and NLP frameworks or tools like TensorFlow or PyTorch is a bonus.
  • A strong willingness to learn about LLMs and experience in any related projects is advantageous.
  • Problem-solving skills and an interest in creative approaches to AI challenges.
  • Ability to learn and adapt quickly to new technologies in AI and NLP.
  • Analytical thinking and the ability to work independently as well as in dynamic teams.
  • Good communication skills to collaborate effectively within the team.
  • Attention to detail and a commitment to quality, with a basic understanding of writing unit tests.


REQUIRED EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS

  • Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Interest or experience in software development, with a focus on AI/ML and NLP is preferred.
  • Exposure to full software development life cycle practices, including coding standards and code reviews.
  • Experience working with APIs and basic knowledge of databases.
  • A basic understanding of product development and a willingness to participate in product discussions.


DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

  • A strong interest in natural language processing and machine learning practices.
  • Experience with LLM applications for translation or content generation is a plus.
  • Interest in full-stack development is beneficial.
  • Experience or interest in working within collaborative team settings on AI projects.
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., GIT) is desirable.
  • Experience or interest in the localization or language services industry is advantageous.



By applying, I confirm I have read and accept TransPerfect's Privacy Policy: https://www.transperfect.com/about/data-privacy-recruiting.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Company Description

Job Description

Join a dynamic and diverse global team dedicated to developing innovative solutions that uncover the complete consumer journey for our clients. We are seeking an experienced Data Scientist with expertise in statistics, advanced data analysis and data validation. You will work on all our (de)coding methodologies for our receipt capture consumer products.

Job Description

About the Role


Collaborative Environment: Work with an international team in a flexible and supportive setting.
Analyze and support the setup of newly developed features, test processes, monitor outcomes, investigate issues and share insights with relevant stakeholders
Methodology Enhancement: Evaluate and improve current methodologies and algorithms within the Receipt Capture space
Deployment Support: Assist the technical deployment of proposed enhancements and new solutions.
Documentation: Document findings, methodologies, and best practices comprehensively.


Qualifications

About You

You have successfully applied your statistical and data analytical skills to real-world scenarios, demonstrating your ability to handle complex data sets and generate actionable insights.


Educational Background: Master’s Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Socio-economics, Data Science, or a related field with a minimum of 3 years of relevant experience.
Statistical Expertise: Strong statistical and logical skills, with experience in data cleaning, statistical modeling, and data validation techniques.
Data Analysis Skills: Proficiency in manipulating, analyzing, and interpreting large data sets.
Programming Proficiency: Experience with Python or another high-level programming language, with a willingness to learn Python.
Database Handling: Skilled in SQL and working with queries and large-scale databases
Continuous Learning: Eagerness to adopt and develop evolving technologies and tools.
Communication and Collaboration: Strong communication, writing, and collaboration skills.


Additional Information

Embark on this exciting journey to transform our panel measurement business and make a significant impact in the world of consumer analytics. Apply now to be a part of our innovative team!

Our Benefits


Flexible working environment
Volunteer time off
LinkedIn Learning
Employee-Assistance-Program (EAP)


About NIQ

NIQ is the world’s leading consumer intelligence company, delivering the most complete understanding of consumer buying behavior and revealing new pathways to growth. In 2023, NIQ combined with GfK, bringing together the two industry leaders with unparalleled global reach. With a holistic retail read and the most comprehensive consumer insights—delivered with advanced analytics through state-of-the-art platforms—NIQ delivers the Full View™. NIQ is an Advent International portfolio company with operations in 100+ markets, covering more than 90% of the world’s population.

For more information, visit NIQ.com

Want to keep up with our latest updates?

Follow us on: LinkedIn | Instagram | Twitter | Facebook

Our commitment to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

NIQ is committed to reflecting the diversity of the clients, communities, and markets we measure within our own workforce. We exist to count everyone and are on a mission to systematically embed inclusion and diversity into all aspects of our workforce, measurement, and products. We enthusiastically invite candidates who share that mission to join us. We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action-Employer, making decisions without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability status, age, marital status, protected veteran status or any other protected class. Our global non-discrimination policy covers these protected classes in every market in which we do business worldwide. Learn more about how we are driving diversity and inclusion in everything we do by visiting the NIQ News Center: https://nielseniq.com/global/en/news-center/diversity-inclusion

Title: AI Enginer (Lisbon Based)
Description:
Boost IT is a Portuguese technology consultancy company, we are integrated into one of the most entrepreneurial groups in Portugal, with investment in more than 30 companies.




We want to be known for being the most dynamic, energetic and reliable company to operate in the market and, for that, we want to count on you.




If you're passionate about technology and want to work on the most relevant technology projects, then this ad could be for you!


Tasks



Develop and implement machine learning models and algorithms to solve complex problems.


Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing software systems.


Analyze large sets of data to extract meaningful insights and improve model performance.


Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies and apply them to ongoing projects.


Conduct thorough testing and validation of AI models to ensure accuracy and reliability.



Requirements



Expertise in the Scala programming language is a must


Experience using Scala Play Framework


Advanced elastic search experience


Postgres database or other relational database experience


Experience in content apps


Experience in microservices


Knowledge of a variety of AI techniques such as natural language processing, classification, clustering, optimization, deep neural networks with a good understanding of the mathematical underpinning and real-world advantages/drawbacks preferred


Fluency in English is required, any additional language skills are an asset


Knowledge of data structures, semantic extraction, and text representation in an NLP context


Proficiency in Python (OOP) preferred


Experience in using technologies such as Docker and cloud (Azure, GCP or AWS)


Experience in creating APIs (RESTful, Asynchronous, etc.)


Familiarity with the concepts and applications of LLMs a plus


Ability to write clean, production ready code



Benefits



22 days of annual vacation leave (+ 3 additional days on us! - Birthday, Christmas Eve, and New Year's Eve)


Hybrid work arrangement- 1 day a week in the office


Career progression opportunities


Training plan


Health insurance


Team building activities





Boost IT. Doing IT. Better

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
With just over 7 years of experience in the Portuguese market, we share our DNA with more than 200 workers and position our offer according to 3 lines of service:Strategy (Outsourcing, NeXel, Team as a Service, Tech Academies);R&D (Bootcamps, POC, Tech Lab);Nearshore.In ADENTIS, we focus on PEOPLE.

This is our emotional salary:Great Work-Life balance;Very flexible organizational routine;Health benefits (for you and your family);Team Building activities;Over 300 protocols to offer you great discounts in different areas;Continuous professional development sponsored by our Training and Certification Department;Regular feedback on your performance through a personalized plan;Comprehensive career plan and progression involving assertive performance reviews.Responsibilities:Develop and implement machine learning models tailored to CRM and platform contexts.Design and deploy models for retention use cases, anomaly detection, regression analysis, and other predictive analytics tasks.Create and manage automated data pipelines for efficient data processing and model deployment.Ensure seamless integration of machine learning models into existing systems and workflows.Monitor data flows to ensure the quality, consistency, and reliability of data used for machine learning models.Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues promptly to maintain smooth operations.Utilize Azure Databricks for data processing, model training, and deployment.Optimize the use of Databricks resources to achieve efficient and cost-effective machine learning solutions.Design and maintain the infrastructure required for machine learning projects, ensuring scalability and performance.Collaborate with IT and DevOps teams to manage cloud resources and deployment environments.You must have:


Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role, with a focus on CRM and platform-based solutions.
Strong proficiency in developing machine learning models, particularly for retention use cases, anomaly detection, and regression analysis.
Experience with pipeline automation and data flow monitoring.
Hands-on experience with Azure Databricks for data processing and machine learning tasks.
Familiarity with cloud infrastructure management, preferably within the Azure ecosystem.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Scala, and experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to work on complex data-driven projects.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools is a plus.
Experience with CRM platforms and customer data analytics is an advantage.
European Union Citizenship or Portuguese Working Visa / Portuguese Residency.
Availability to go to the office, twice a week.If you want to be part of a real People First organization, join us! Send your CV to ******

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Job Description

The Position

Job Summary

We are seeking a talented and experienced AI/ML engineer to join our dynamic technology team. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and AI Agent technologies. This role will be instrumental in designing, developing, and deploying AI-driven solutions that streamline business processes, enhance decision-making, and improve overall efficiency.

Organon is a Women’s Health Company that believes in a better and healthier every day for every woman! We are a passionate, global community of thousands dedicated to redefining the future of women’s health. Our mission is to deliver impactful medicines and solutions for a healthier every day. But what really makes it work at Organon is our people.

We’re looking for real, passionate team players, curious innovators, forward thinkers, empowered by the idea of shaping their career, and ready to bring their fire to embrace change and the opportunities it brings for progress.

At Organon, you’ll get to enjoy the best of both worlds: the open, agile, collaborative culture of a start-up, and operating at the scale of a fortune 500 company with an international footprint that serves people in more than 140 markets.

It’s going to be an exciting future—come be a part of it!

Responsibilities


Design, develop, and implement AI/ML solutions to address complex business challenges
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for automation and AI integration
Develop machine learning models and algorithms to analyze data and generate predictive insights
Design and implement scalable frameworks for autonomous AI agents capable of achieving specific goals within enterprise environments
Evaluate and integrate third-party AI and automation tools and platforms
Maintain and optimize existing AI solutions to ensure performance and scalability
Conduct research on emerging AI and automation trends and technologies to stay ahead of industry advancements
Provide technical expertise and support for AI and automation projects, including troubleshooting and resolving issues
Document development processes, code, and methodologies to ensure knowledge sharing and continuity


Required Education, Experience, And Skills


Bachelor's degree in Computer science, Engineering, Data Science or relevant field and/or Technical certification with at least 2+ years of AI experience.
AI/ML and Automation Expertise: Demonstrated experience in the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions
Programming Proficiency: Advanced skills in programming languages, including Python, Java, and C++, are essential.
AI/ML: A robust understanding of machine learning frameworks and libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, PyTorch, LangChain, other Agentic frameworks Swarm, Crew.ai
Generative AI Knowledge: A solid grasp of Generative AI architecture with hands-on experience in Large Language Models such as OpenAI, Llama, and Claude.
Cloud Services Acumen: A good familiarity with cloud services like AWS and Azure, particularly their AI/ML offerings.
Problem-Solving Prowess: Exceptional problem-solving capabilities with the ability to operate both independently and as part of a team


Preferred Education, Experience, And Skills


Experience with natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision technologies
Knowledge of data engineering and ETL processes
Certification in AI, machine learning.
Experience in Pharma industry is a plus


Secondary Job Description

Who We Are:

Organon delivers ingenious health solutions that enable people to live their best lives. We are a $6.5 billion global healthcare company focused on making a world of difference for women, their families and the communities they care for. We have an important portfolio and are growing it by investing in the unmet needs of Women’s Health, expanding access to leading biosimilars and touching lives with a diverse and trusted portfolio of health solutions. Our Vision is clear: A better and healthier every day for every woman.

As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome applications from candidates with a diverse background. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all our applicants.

Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully

Organon LLC, does not accept unsolicited assistance from search firms for employment opportunities. All CVs / resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at our company without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of our company. No fee will be paid in the event a candidate is hired by our company as a result of an agency referral where no pre-existing agreement is in place. Where agency agreements are in place, introductions are position specific. Please, no phone calls or emails.

Annualized Salary Range

Annualized Salary Range (Global)

Annualized Salary Range (Canada)

Please Note: Pay ranges are specific to local market and therefore vary from country to country.

Employee Status

Regular

Relocation:

No relocation

VISA Sponsorship

No

Travel Requirements: Organon employees must be able to satisfy all applicable travel and credentialing requirements, including associated vaccination prerequisites

No Travel Required

Flexible Work Arrangements

Not Specified

Title: Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer
HTML:
Acerca da Logicalis

A Logicalis é um Global IT Solutions & Digital Services Provider que acelera a transformação digital dos seus clientes em todo o mundo, através de uma rede internacional dotada de centros de especialização, equipas líderes do sector e parcerias estratégicas (que incluem Cisco, Microsoft, Dell Technologies, Citrix, entre outros).

Enquanto Architects of Change™, conciliamos a visão estratégica dos nossos clientes, com o nosso conhecimento tecnológico nos principais drivers da indústria (tais como: Cibersegurança, Cloud, IoT, Data Analytics), e colmatamos as suas prioridades, tais como eficiência operacional, inovação, risco/compliance e governance de dados.

Descrição da Função:

Ajuda-nos a fazer do CC360º uma ferramenta melhor para os nossos clientes e a proporcionar experiências incríveis! Temos uma oportunidade como Data Scientist & Machine Learning na Logicalis Portugal.

Competências e Experiência Necessária:

  • Experiência em funções semelhantes;
  • Experiência com linguagem de programação Python;
  • Experiência com algoritmos e estruturas de dados;
  • Experiência em LLM, modelos text-to-speech e speech-to-text (preferencial);
  • Experiência em RAG (preferencial);
  • Experiência em Azure AI (preferencial);
  • Experiência com frameworks de ML (Tensorflow, PyTorch, scikit-learn);
  • Experiência em um ou mais modelos IA, PNL, otimização, RL, séries temporais, modelos generativos, sinais, campos de reconhecimento de padrões;
  • Experiência com API de serviço Web;
  • Bons conhecimentos de matemática, nomeadamente em estatística, e Machine Learning;
  • Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática ou similar (preferencial)

Outros detalhes:

  • Forte sentido de responsabilidade, proatividade, polivalência e adaptabilidade.
  • Habilidades de resolução de problemas e capacidade de trabalhar em ambientes dinâmicos.

Title: Machine Learning Officer - Junior
Description:
🤔Who are we?




As the founding entity of RAINBOW PARTNERS, Quanteam is a consulting firm specializing in the fields of Banking, Finance, and Financial Services. Guided by our core values of closeness, teamwork, diversity, and excellence, our team of 1000 expert consultants, representing 35 different nationalities, collaborates across 12 international offices: Paris, Lyon, New York, Montreal, London, Brussels, Geneva, Lisbon, Porto, Casablanca, Madrid and Singapore. Committed to sustainability (Ecovadis Gold), diversity (gender index: 92%), and quality of work life (Best Workplace Experience), Quanteam is a forward-thinking enterprise.




🚀 Our Expertise




With a dual expertise in both business and IT, Quanteam supports its corporate clients (investment banks, asset management companies, private and retail banks, custodians, etc.) across the entire Front-to-Back spectrum in evolving their business activities and transformation projects.




Our teams are organized into 5 expertise areas:

➡ Quantitative Finance

➡ Risk, Compliance, and Regulatory

➡ Operations and Finance

➡ Transformation and Organization

➡ Information Systems




🔎We are looking for a Machine Learning Officer - Junior.




MAIN TASKS:




Develop End to End Product Lifecycle:

Develop Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions i.e., collect and label data, setup and train models, test and evaluate results.
Develop, modify, and support in-house applications, working together with the data scientists and developers of the AC team.
Work closely with clients during all stages of the application life cycle.
Design the most adequate approaches to solve the identified problems within the company's framework.




Implement and assist the deployment and maintenance of models and software's:

Follow industry best practices to implement and scale out the developed solutions into production grade software.
Assist the operational teams with the deployment, monitoring and maintenance of the developed solutions.
Contribute to disseminate a culture of data driven solutions within CIB.
Maintain a strong market watch on the latest developments on methodologies, technologies and tools.







YOUR PROFILE AND SKILLS:

Ability to explain the results of a model and the different elements impacting it.
Statistical and quantitative analysis skills (e.g., machine learning models, statistical models, Bayesian statistics, probability theory, time series analysis.
Knowledge of at least one ML development stack (e.g. scikit-learn, keras, ...).
Knowledge of NLP techniques.
French and Portuguese are a plus.
Effective Programming skills (e.g., Python, R, Java, Go) and algorithmic knowledge.
Knowledge of databases and associated tools (SQL and NoSQL).
Familiarity with continuous integration tools (pref. Jenkins, Git).
Knowledge of deep learning architectures and frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow,...).
Fluent in English (spoken and written)




📍Hybrid regime in the Lisbon or Porto office.




🚀If you feel this opportunity is for you, send your CV and join our team!

Show more

Title: Junior Machine Learning Engineer
HTML:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:


Decskill Talent: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.


Decskill Boost: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.


Decskill Connect: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.


At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.


We are looking for a Junior Machine Learning Engineer for a hybrid project based in Porto or Lisbon (2x/Week).


Requirements:

  • + 2 years of experience in Machine Learning;
  • Effective Programming skills (e.g., Python, R, Java, Go) and algorithmic knowledge;
  • Knowledge of databases and associated tools (SQL and NoSQL);
  • Familiarity with continuous integration tools (pref. Jenkins, Git);
  • Knowledge of deep learning architectures and frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow,…);
  • Ability to explain the results of a model and the different elements impacting it;
  • Statistical and quantitative analysis skills (e.g., machine learning models, statistical models, Bayesian statistics, probability theory, time series analysis;
  • Knowledge of at least one ML development stack (e.g. scikit-learn, keras, …);
  • Knowledge of NLP techniques;
  • Fluency in English (both written and spoken) is mandatory.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop End to End Product Lifecycle;
  • Develop Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions i.e., collect and label data, setup and train models, test and evaluate results;
  • Develop, modify, and support in-house applications, working hand-in-hand with the data scientists and developers of the team;
  • Work closely with clients during all stages of the application life cycle;
  • Design the most adequate approaches to solve the identified problems within the company’s framework;
  • Implement and assist the deployment and maintenance of models and software;
  • Follow industry best practices to implement and scale out the developed solutions into production grade software;
  • Assist the operational teams with the deployment, monitoring and maintenance of the developed solutions.


If you’re interested in this job please send your CV to carolina.novais@decskill.com with reference CN/JML.


Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description:
Luxclusif is a technology-driven global B2B platform founded in 2013 and part of Farfetch since 2021. Dedicated to redefining the luxury paradigm by offering premium pre-owned fashion to a global audience, Luxclusive has pioneered the global luxury resale market, with advanced data-driven solutions to facilitate the buying and selling of high-end pre-owned items. With operations spread across the globe and strategic warehouses in key locations, ensure a seamless supply of luxury goods, ensuring item curation, quality control, operations, logistics to technology integrations and sales, delivering an unmatched resale experience for brands, retailers, and end-customers.

THE TEAM
The R&D team is responsible for building up a suitable software solution for different clients that allows them to liquidate their products. The R&D team structure is based in Manila, Porto and Brazil members.

PORTO
Our office is near Porto, in the north of Portugal, and is located in a vibrant business hub. It offers a dynamic and welcoming environment where our employees can connect and network with a large community of tech professionals.

THE ROLE
As a Junior Data Scientist, you will be part of a multidisciplinary team within the Data cluster, responsible for the development of strategic data products to enable company competitiveness and analytical insights collaborating closer with the R&D Products line. We're looking for a team player that is passionate about tech products and is looking for eager opportunities to grow.

What You'll Do


Collaboratively design, build, and maintain solutions within our platform using multiple tools applying statistical approaches and machine learning techniques
Working closely with our Engineers and Analysts in highly impactful and complex challenges
Design, Build and Expand our data products, taking them to the next level while using state-of-the-art technologies
Perform analysis and experiments that allow the team to identify opportunities and follow new implementations contributing directly to the evolution of our data products





Who You Are


You have a degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Machine Learning or equivalent specialized training/certification
You’re capable to design, model, develop, test and maintain machine learning solutions and you have the experience to productize these solutions
You have experience in SQL and Python programming (familiar with TensorFlow and other machine learning libraries)
You are problem solving oriented and you’re also comfortable speaking English
Experience with CI/CD tools and cloud environments are a plus





Rewards & Benefits


Health insurance for the whole family, flexible working environment and well-being support and tools
Extra days off, sabbatical program and days for you to give back for the community
Training opportunities and free access to Udemy
Flexible benefits program





EQUAL OPPORTUNITIES STATEMENT


FARFETCH is an equal opportunities employer ensuring that all applicants are treated equally and fairly throughout our recruitment process. We are determined that no applicant experiences discrimination on the basis of sex, race, ethnicity, religion or belief, disability, age, gender identity, ancestry, sexual orientation, veteran status, marriage and civil partnership, pregnancy and maternity, or any other basis prohibited by applicable law.





SCAM DISCLAIMER


It has come to our attention that there may be fraudulent activities involving individuals or organizations falsely claiming to represent Farfetch in order to attract candidates to a SCAM. Please be aware that Farfetch does not conduct recruitment processes through messaging apps or any unofficial communication channels, other than our official careers website. Additionally, Farfetch will never ask candidates for any form of payment during the recruitment process





We're looking for a team player that is passionate about tech products and is looking for eager opportunities to grow.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
M/F







DESAFIO:

Procuramos um Data Scientist com experiência, espírito crítico e gosto no contacto com o negócio para integrar a nossa equipa de Data Science. Trabalhamos em projetos para as diferentes áreas da empresa, transformando dados em insights que orientam decisões estratégicas.







O QUE ESPERAMOS DE TI:




Colaboração com as equipas de negócio para entender os desafios e transformar problemas em projetos data-driven.
Capacidade de compreender problemas de negócio, estruturá-los e traduzi-los para soluções técnicas.
Proatividade e autonomia para identificar oportunidades e propor melhorias.
Capacidade para estruturar projetos de forma eficaz, definindo as diferentes fases, tarefas e objetivos em cada etapa, mantendo sempre uma visão estratégica - big picture do projeto.
Gosto pela análise de tendências e utilização de dados para suporte à tomada de decisão.
Habilidade para desenvolver e otimizar soluções baseadas em inferência estatística, machine learning ou algoritmos avançados de IA.
Comunicação clara para apresentar resultados e recomendações às partes interessadas.







PERFIL:

Licenciatura/Mestrado em Engenharia, Data Science, Data Analytics, Ciências da Computação, Matemática, Estatística ou áreas relacionadas.
Experiência comprovada como Data Scientist ou Senior Data Analyst.
Pensamento crítico e abordagem orientada à resolução de problemas (problem-solver).
Sólidos conhecimentos de programação em Python e linguagens de consulta de dados como SQL.
Experiência em trabalho com metodologias Agile, incluindo o uso de repositórios de dados e ferramentas de versionamento para colaboração e gestão de projetos.
Familiaridade com o processamento e análise de grandes volumes de dados.
Fortes capacidades de comunicação e apresentação, facilitando a interação com diferentes stakeholders.







VALORIZAMOS AINDA:

Experiência na utilização de ferramentas de Business Intelligence, como o Excel e PowerBI.
Experiência com plataformas de AutoML, como a Data Robot.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
Linde Portugal, LDA

Data Scientist (m/f/d)

Porto or Lisboa, Portugal, Barcelona, Spain | req22905

What You Will Enjoy Doing


You will generate value out of data by identification, driving and implementing use cases in the area of analytics across all value streams/ regions/functions
Furthermore, you will provide profound business understanding combined with a strong skillset of advanced data engineering and data science to transform business questions into data driven insight in language such as SQL, R, Python etc
Together with the data science lead drive the concept of data insights and advanced analytics as a key and strategic area in the field of business analytics
You will support in definition and execution of global business analytics strategy, help to position business analytics team as central point of contact for all data analytics questions and use cases
Will be under your responsibility the execution/ management of projects within the area of advanced business analytics closely aligned with business and senior management
Also, you will ensure the Coaching and Training of virtual teams and functional areas within the core disciplines of analytics
You will actively participate in the processes of digitization and automation of tasks, contributing to the company's evolution towards digital transformation


What Makes You Great


You have 5-7 years of experience in analytical insights and data science and hold a master’s degree in STEM from a prestigious university
Also, you have a natural ability to turn concepts into computational systems and transform business questions into data-driven insights
In addition, you have strong expertise in Finance, Sales, and Supply Chain processes
You are an expert in data modeling, feature engineering, and have strong knowledge of SQL, R, R Shiny, and Python
Furthermore, you have a solid understanding of data and system architectures and their role in digital transformation
You possess excellent English communication skills and can effectively engage with technical and business teams
Also, you have experience in Scrum and Agile methodologies to manage projects and drive high-performing teams
Additionally you are willing to travel when necessary to support business initiatives
You are ready to face new challenges and actively contribute to the success of the company's digital transformation project
You are able to collect, interpret and use data effectively, driving digital transformation


Why you will love working with us

At Linde we identify ourselves with our products – either working for the technical or medical gases business. Being a company with a long tradition in the gases business, we not only care about our customers and high quality products, but most importantly about our employees. While working with us, expect a safe workplace, high safety standards and a true commitment from our managers to safety.

What we offer you!

At Linde, the sky is not the limit. If you’re looking to build a career where your work reaches beyond your job description and betters the people with whom you work, the communities we serve, and the world in which we all live, at Linde, your opportunities are limitless. Be Linde. Be Limitless.

This role is a full time position based on an unlimited contract. The standard weekly working hours will be from 08:00 hrs till 17:00 hrs.

Have we inspired you? Let´s talk about it

We are looking forward to receiving your complete application (motivation letter, CV, certificates) via our online job market.

Any designations used of course apply to persons of all genders. The form of speech used here is for simplicity only.

Linde acts responsibly towards its shareholders, business partners, employees, society and the environment in every one of its business areas, regions and locations across the globe. The company is committed to technologies and products that unite the goals of customer value and sustainable development.
Show more

Title: Applied Scientist (Machine Learning)
Description:
Company Description

Hello! We're Teya.

Teya is a payment and software service provider, headquartered in London serving small, local businesses across Europe. Founded in 2019, we build easy to use, integrated tools that enable our members to accept payments and boost business performance.

At Teya we believe small, local businesses are the lifeblood of our communities.

We’re here because we don’t believe there’s a level playing field that gives small businesses with a fighting chance against the giants of the high street.

We’re here because we see banks and legacy service providers making things harder for them. We don’t think the best technology or the best service should be reserved for those with the biggest headquarters.

We’re here to fight for a future where small, local businesses can thrive, and to commit the same dedication they offer all of us.

Become a part of our story.

We’re looking for exceptional talent to join our mission. We offer a chance to create impact in a high-energy and connected culture, while benefiting from continuous learning opportunities, a supportive community which is proud to serve our mission, and comprehensive benefits.

Job Description

Your Mission

You will be part of a joint team of machine learning engineers, data scientists, data analysts, and product managers building and evolving ML models, real-time systems, reports, and performing deep analysis of pricing, retention, and offer strategies.

Working with advanced predictive models, MLOps best practices, and scalable software systems, you will implement and evolve intelligent solutions to align Teya with the success of our customers.

In This Role, You’ll Be


Helping Teya to use data to drive business decisions by implementing and continuously improving through experimentation advanced machine learning models.
Working on projects including but not limited to customer lifetime value, churn propensity, forecasting, risk, cost-to-serve and cost-to-acquire modelling
Building predictive models to a production level adopting best practices for coding, deployment, monitoring, and experimentation.


Qualifications

Your Story


Background in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Mathematics, Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Economics or equivalent)
5+ years of professional working experience
Someone who thrives in the incremental delivery of high quality production systems
Proficiency in Java, Python, SQL, Jupyter Notebook
Experience with Machine Learning and statistical inference.
Understanding of ETL processes and data pipelines and ability to work closely with Machine Learning Engineers for product implementation
Ability to communicate model objectives and performance to business stakeholders
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Ability to think creatively and insightfully about business problems
Nice to have:
Proficiency with Snowflake
Proficiency with Amazon SageMaker
Proficiency with Docker and Kubernetes

Additional Information

The Perks


We trust you, so we offer flexible working hours, as long it suits both you and your team;
Health Insurance;
Meal Allowance;
25 days of Annual leave (+ Bank holidays);
Public Transportation Card;
Frequent team events & activities in the office and outside;
Office snacks every day;
Friendly, comfortable and informal office environment.
Show more

Job Description

Your Mission

You will be part of a joint team of machine learning engineers, data scientists, data analysts, and product managers building and evolving ML models, real-time systems, reports, and performing deep analysis of pricing, retention, and offer strategies.

Working with advanced predictive models, MLOps best practices, and scalable software systems, you will implement and evolve intelligent solutions to align Teya with the success of our customers.

In This Role, You’ll Be

  • Helping Teya to use data to drive business decisions by implementing and continuously improving through experimentation advanced machine learning models.
  • Working on projects including but not limited to customer lifetime value, churn propensity, forecasting, risk, cost-to-serve and cost-to-acquire modelling
  • Building predictive models to a production level adopting best practices for coding, deployment, monitoring, and experimentation.

Qualifications

Your Story

  • Background in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Mathematics, Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Economics or equivalent)
  • 5+ years of professional working experience
  • Someone who thrives in the incremental delivery of high quality production systems
  • Proficiency in Java, Python, SQL, Jupyter Notebook
  • Experience with Machine Learning and statistical inference.
  • Understanding of ETL processes and data pipelines and ability to work closely with Machine Learning Engineers for product implementation
  • Ability to communicate model objectives and performance to business stakeholders
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Ability to think creatively and insightfully about business problems
  • Nice to have:
    • Proficiency with Snowflake
    • Proficiency with Amazon SageMaker
    • Proficiency with Docker and Kubernetes
Additional Information

The Perks

  • We trust you, so we offer flexible working hours, as long it suits both you and your team;
  • Health Insurance;
  • Meal Allowance;
  • 25 days of Annual leave (+ Bank holidays);
  • Public Transportation Card;
  • Frequent team events & activities in the office and outside;
  • Office snacks every day;
  • Friendly, comfortable and informal office environment.

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
The Tribe

'Prozis is a powerhouse product developing company. Every day we make new products. That is only possible because we developed our own proprietary technology that ensures that we bring you high quality, beautiful and fair priced products. We endure in our philosophy of a 4.0 vertical process, manufacturing in our own facilities or with the help of our superpartners. We do everything: idea, concept, design, manufacturing, quality control, marketing, sales, logistics, printing, distribution, client support, software development, photo, video, 3D and philosophy. We deliver wherever you are, whenever you want. We don’t compromise. We breathe technology, drink design and feed on our will to exceed ourselves making the best products in the world. This all starts in 2007 with a crazy guy in a garage that thinks he can change the world for the better. Right now, we are hundreds, going to thousands of crazy but focused people. Will is a skill. There is a lot of people that want to buy us out. We don’t have a F****** price tag. It’s not about the money. It’s about our mission. Trust us. We will feed your body and mind with everything you need to exceed yourself.'

- miguel milhão


The Team

Prozis is growing and Data is flying everywhere, do you think you can catch it? Prozis Data Analytics Team collaborates with multiple business stakeholders, including C-level, and has a value-driven proposition in the company.


The Role

As a Business Data Scientist, you will be working in a multitalented team and your role will be analyzing large amounts of data, diving deep to identify business insights and opportunities, design simulations and experiments, developing statistical and ML models by tailoring to business needs, and collaborating with other Data Scientists, Data Analysts, Business Intelligence Engineers and Data Engineers.

You will be responsible for the following topics:

  • Explore, clean, manipulate and analyze valuable data from different data sources with SQL, Python, Scala or equivalent;
  • Translate product objectives to data science problems and vice-versa;
  • Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models that improve customer engagement, personalize shopping experiences, and optimize operational efficiency.
  • Proactively perform data exploration to uncover future opportunities.


You

You are an amazing professional, with a degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Physics or a related field, experience in a similar role and knowledge of at least some of the following:

  • Ability to model analytical and statistical problems as well as different validation techniques;
  • Strong knowledge of SQL;
  • Python (or similar) programming skills using machine learning experimentation and development best practices;
  • Experience with Data Visualization for technical & non-technical audiences;
  • Knowledge of Big Data and Cloud technologies is a plus (Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Azure, Databricks)


What are your superpowers?

  • Strong technical and analytical skills in the realm of Data;
  • Proactivity and autonomy;
  • Good collaboration and communication skills;
  • Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.


Btw: Prozis is not for everyone.


Nos termos da Política de Recrutamento do grupo PROZIS, a pessoa portadora de deficiência, nos termos da Lei n.º 38/2004, de 18/08, cuja candidatura não tenha sido admitida ou respondida no prazo de 30 dias, tem a faculdade de pedir a fundamentação da decisão e a sua reavaliação através de pedido apresentado no canal de denúncias constante de www.prozis.com, na categoria 'direitos e protecção dos indivíduos'.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Apgar is looking to recruit a Junior Machine Learning Engineer who wants to join our growing team in Porto or Lisbon and be part of a group of +200 teammates who are passionate about data.




Some of the advantages of working with us..

· Flexible working schedule and ability to work in a hybrid mode (5 times in the office per month; 6 weeks a year fully remote from wherever you agree on)

· Competitive salary with benefits

· Be supported by a senior consultant (mentor) that will help in your career development

· A team spirit that will make you feel at home

· Be part of a team located in 3 different continents where diversity is as common as the air your breath




Your mission...

- Design and Implement Models: Develop, train, and fine-tune machine learning models to solve specific business problems.
- Data Preparation: J5Collect, clean, preprocess data, and perform feature engineering for training and testing models.
- Deployment and Maintenance: Deploy machine learning models into production environments and monitor their performance.
- Collaboration and Leadership: Work with data scientists, software engineers, and stakeholders, providing technical guidance and leadership.
- Software Development: Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code in Python, developing and maintaining software applications.
- Automation and Scripting: Create scripts to automate tasks and develop tools for data processing and analysis.
- Research and Innovation: Research and test advanced machine learning algorithms and techniques.




You have...

- Strong knowledge of machine learning algorithms and techniques such as Decision Trees, Gradien Boosting, Clustering, Outlier Detection, Time Series Forecasting.

- Strong experience in Python, SQL, and relevant python packages such as Pandas, Scikit-learn, Mathplotlib.

- Proven experience in developing and deploying machine learning models. Experience with MLflow or similar MlOps platfroms is a plus.

- Proven experience in managing data bases such as PostgreSql.

- Proven experienece in using version control systems such as Gitlab.

- Experience in implementing RAG solutions is a plus.

- Experience in implementing APIs in FastAPI or Flask is a plus.

- Experience in Azure Machine Learning, AWS Sagemaker, or Google Cloud machine learning services, PyTorch, or TensorFlow are a plus.

- Ability to clearly articulate ideas and technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

- Collaboration and Teamwork.

- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically.

- A strong desire to continuously learn and stay updated with the latest advancements in machine learning.

- Fluent in English, with the ability to work on international projects.




Who we are…

Apgar is a leading company in the development and implementation of data platforms, recognized by analysts as one of the world leaders in this area.

We support our clients in their digital transformation, through the global team that has more than 200 consultants in our offices located in Europe (Portugal, UK, France, Switzerland, Cyprus), The Americas (USA and Brazil), Middle East (Lebanon) and South Asia and Oceania (Singapore and Australia).

Our consultants work on developing Master Data Management, Data Governance, Data Integration, Advanced Data Analytics and Machine Learning solutions among others.

Let's talk about your future in the world of data management software?




We firmly believe in an ethical approach to recruitment, where every candidate is treated with consideration, fairness, and transparency throughout the selection process, with the aim of respecting diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:




DECSKILL TALENT: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth
DECSKILL BOOST: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.
DECSKILL CONNECT: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.







At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.




We are looking for a Data Scientist to join us Porto.




Requirements:

Build models and machine learning solutions
3/4 years of experience in Data Science
Experience with Python, SQL, PySpark and TensorFlow
Visualize data with Seaborn, Matplotlib or Plotly
Work with large datasets and cloud platforms
Build Data-driven solutions




If you’re interested in this job please send your CV in English to goncalo.delgado@decskill.com with reference “GD / DS”.







Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Title: Data Scientist @Porto
Description:
We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!




We are looking for an Amazing: Data Scientist @Porto

Seniority: 3+ years

Location : Hybrid - Lisbon




Skills Needed?




Bachelor / Master in Computer Engineering or similar;
3+ years of experience in data science, machine learning, or AI.
Proficiency in Python (Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch);
Strong understanding of statistics, probability, and data modeling.
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Snowflake, etc.).
Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and their ML services.
Experience working with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop, Databricks).
Familiarity with MLOps, version control (Git), and CI/CD for model deployment.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Fluent in english;
The candidate has to be in Portugal and open to a hybrid position.







Why should you become part of our family?




You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!







Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.We believe transparency, trust and integrity are the pillars of any business and relationship and that is what we promise our clients and employees who join our company KCS IT.




Here, you can be totally sure about this: we value each person that joins us. We welcome everyone as part of this family and we do everything we can so that we can learn and grow together.

Title: Computational / Data Scientist
Description:
Job Opportunity - Computational / Data ScientistThe GIMM – Gulbenkian Institute for Molecular Medicine is a pioneering Portuguese private research foundation with an ambitious vision for fundamental scientific exploration and its profound impact on global health and well-being. Founded in 2023, GIMM is the result of the merge of two leading research institutes: Instituto de Medicina Molecular João Lobo Antunes (iMM) and Instituto Gulbenkian de Ciência (IGC) and dedicates to unraveling the fundamental mysteries of life and aims to be at the forefront of transdisciplinary research.

GIMM opens a call to hire a Computational / Data Scientist with PhD correspondent to the initial level under the terms of the applicable regulation, under an Unfixed-Term Employment Contract within the project IMM-Care- Boosting Clinical Research for the Benefit of Society" – HORIZON-WIDERA-2022- ACCESS-01-01-two-stage, funded by European Commission and co-funded by the Portuguese government. The Researcher will join our recently established Microbiome in Health and Disease Translational Laboratory coordinated by Ana Santos Almeida at GIMM-CARE.

Work Plan Activities: We are looking for a highly motivated computational or data scientist to join our team and lead a large-scale longitudinal study aimed at identifying and validating microbiome biomarkers for early diagnosis and outcomes of colorectal cancer (CRC). As part of this project, you will be responsible for developing a microbiome-based artificial intelligence platform for diagnosis and response to cancer therapy. This will involve integrating microbiome data with clinical and lifestyle – diet, stress, sleep and physical exercise – information. To be successful in this role, you should have experience with microbiome metagenomics and metabolomics pipelines and analysis, as well as data integration from clinical data, lifestyle factors, and blood genomic biomarkers. You will need to be comfortable working with large datasets, complex database integration, as well as be proficient in statistical analysis. In addition to your technical responsibilities, you will also be expected to actively contribute to the intellectual environment of the lab and the institute. This includes preparing and presenting scientific progress in seminars, conferences, and peer-reviewed publications. If you are passionate about using your expertise to make a real difference in the fight against CRC, we encourage you to apply.

Profile of Candidate: Any National, foreign and stateless candidate(s) who hold the following requirements can apply:

PhD in computational biology, bioinformatics, computer science, microbiology, or related disciplines;Significant experience in the analysis of omics data, including metagenomics and metabolomics, in academia or industry;Proven training in big data or health data analysis;Solid knowledge of the human microbiome and bacterial genetics/genomics is preferred;Strong proficiency in R, Python, SQL and Unix command-line interfaces;Prior experience in machine learning and deep learning models is desirable, as is experience with workflow managers such as Snakemake;Strong writing and oral communication skills in English;Strong publication record in peer-reviewed journals.Application process: The call is open from 2 nd of April until 16 th of May 2025 (30 working days), and the application documents (indicated below) should be submitted, in PDF format, to People & Culture Team through the email ****** , by identifying the reference of the position in the "Subject":

Detailed CV;PhD Certificate;Contact of 2 references.Non-discrimination and equal access policy: GIMM promotes a non-discrimination and equal access policy, wherefore no candidate can be privileged, benefited, impaired or deprived of any rights whatsoever, or be exempt of any duties based on their ancestry, age, sex, sexual preference, marital status, family and economic conditions, instruction, origin or social conditions, genetic heritage, reduced work capacity, disability, chronic illness, nationality, ethnic origin or race, origin territory, language, religion, political or ideological convictions and union membership.

Evaluation criteria: The admitted applications will be evaluated taking into account the quality, timeliness and relevance of the scientific path (scientific production and research experience) and curriculum of each candidate (a) and their adequacy to the proposed work plan.

First phase: Curriculum Analysis (60%) and Motivation Letter (30%).Second phase: The jury will select for the interview (evaluation: 10%) the 3 candidates who obtained in the first phase the highest ranking, with a minimum of 80%.The present call is exclusively aimed at filling the indicated vacancy and may be terminated until the homologation of the final candidates' ranking list and expires with the respective occupation of the position on offer.
